entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:16 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -40.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanirajak (Hall Beach Airport) 04:57 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -40.1°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -57
Dewpoint: -44.5°C
Wind: N 24 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 38.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Ice fog at times this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 38. Wind chill near minus 57. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 43.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 43. Wind chill minus 57 this evening and minus 63 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 34.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 34. Wind chill minus 58 in the morning and minus 44 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
